receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must show the date when the expense occurred

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must clearly describe the type of expense or service purchased

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must show the complete amount paid including all taxes and fees

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must display the business name of the supplier who provided goods or services

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must show the tax registration number of the supplier

receiptStandards.required_data: Receipt issued in the name of the employer
receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt should be issued in the name of the employer (the local entity of GoGlobal that employs the worker) wherever possible

receiptStandards.required_data: Details of number and names of participants on report
receiptStandards.rule: For meal expenses, must add details of number and names of participants on the expense report

receiptStandards.required_data: Exchange rate of main banks on the day of purchase
receiptStandards.rule: For overseas expenses, exchange rate of main banks on the day of purchase. If paid with cash in local currency, follow the rate printed on currency exchange transaction receipt. If paid with credit card, follow the rate printed on card statement

receiptStandards.required_data: Receipt must be attached, not invoice
receiptStandards.rule: For domestic travel and accommodation, receipt must be attached, not invoice

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Expenses that fall under taxable income will be treated as per the local regulations

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Include details (date of expense, business purpose, and merchant name) in the expense submission

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: For mileage reimbursements, include To and Fro locations, distance travelled and per diem rates

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Convert amount in local currency and include currency & exchange rate used for foreign currency expenses

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: All expenses when using Client's system or GoGlobal template
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Original receipts must be pasted/stapled onto A4-sized sheets and mailed to GoGlobal K.K. 19F 4-1-28 Toranomon Minato-ku, Tokyo 105-0001. All hard copies must be received by 8th or the previous business day if 8th is a holiday for processing in the same month
E-receipts should be uploaded as PDF files. Avoid printing/scanning them
Expense submission must have an itemized report along with clear receipts
